description: From Latin asthmaticus, from Ancient Greek ἀσθματικός (asthmatikós, “affliected with shortness of breath”), from ἆσθμα (âsthma, “short-drawn breath, panting”) (compare asthma); synchronically, asthma +‎ -ic.

adjectives.description: asthmatic (comparative more asthmatic, superlative most asthmatic)

entries.meaning: Having the characteristics of asthma, as in an "asthmatic cough".
A person who suffers from asthma.
